orbotix.macro
Enum MacroObject.MacroObjectMode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<MacroObject.MacroObjectMode>

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MacroObject.MacroObjectMode>
Enclosing class:
MacroObject
public static enum MacroObject.MacroObjectMode
extends java.lang.Enum<MacroObject.MacroObjectMode>

Enum Constant Summary
CachedStreaming
          Macros will be streamed to the ball and the MacroObject will automatically manage ball memory and streaming Requires firmware version 0.96 or higher on the robot
Chunky
          Macros will be uploaded to the ball in 240 byte chunks until the macro is completely uploaded and then will be executed at once.
Normal
          Macros will be sent to the ball as the temporary macro and will be limited to 250 bytes automatically

Enum Constant Detail

Normal

public static final MacroObject.MacroObjectMode Normal
Macros will be sent to the ball as the temporary macro and will be limited to 250 bytes automatically

CachedStreaming

public static final MacroObject.MacroObjectMode CachedStreaming
Macros will be streamed to the ball and the MacroObject will automatically manage ball memory and streaming Requires firmware version 0.96 or higher on the robot

Chunky

public static final MacroObject.MacroObjectMode Chunky
Macros will be uploaded to the ball in 240 byte chunks until the macro is completely uploaded and then will be executed at once. Limited to 1024 bytes total.
